meanings.definition: The state or quality of being frozen.
meanings.sent1: The frozenness of the ice made it difficult to walk on.
meanings.sent2: The frozenness of the lake in winter was a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent3: The frozenness of the popsicle made it a challenge to eat quickly.
meanings.sent4: The frozenness of time seemed to stop everything around us.
meanings.sent5: The frozenness of the glacier was a breathtaking sight.

meanings.definition: The act of freezing or becoming frozen.
meanings.sent1: She felt the sudden frozenness of the cold air as she stepped outside.
meanings.sent2: The frozenness of the meat was a result of being left in the freezer too long.
meanings.sent3: The frozenness of the computer screen made her realize it had crashed.
meanings.sent4: The frozenness of the river prevented boats from passing through.
meanings.sent5: The frozenness of the ice cream was a sign it had been left out too long.
